snippet: A divorce left Michael Stratton owing thousands of dollars in back child support payments. He is now working toward a job in information technology.
abstract: Community Service Society, one of the seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, buys one-month MetroCard allowing Michael Stratton to commute from Valley Stream, LI, to his IT training sessions in Bronx.
lead_paragraph: A divorce left Michael Stratton owing thousands of dollars in back child support payments. He is now working toward a job in information technology.

headline.main: After Working in Film, a Queens Man Hopes for a Life in Technology
headline.print_headline: After a Time in Film, a Queens Man Looks to Steady His Finances
